QUERY_CLOB:
select 
a110.pass_yn,
a110.application_id,
a110.page_id,
a110.page_name,
a110.redirect_url,
a110.button_name,  
a110.label, 
a110.region,
a110.created_by,
a110.created_on,
a110.last_updated_by, 
a110.last_updated_on,
case when a110.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Button, `%1`/`%2`, has an invalid link: `%0` (region : `%3`)^',
     p0 => a110.redirect_url,
     p1 => a110.button_name,  
     p2 => a110.label, 
     p3 => a110.region
     )
     end as validation_failure_message,
case when a110.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Button has an invalid link (page %0, app %1)^',
     p0 => a110.page_id,
     p1 => a110.application_id
     )
     end as issue_title,
a110.component_id,
a110.parent_component_id,
a110.workspace
from (
    select 
    eba_stds_parser.is_valid_url (p_origin_app_id => bl.application_id,
                                p_url           => bl.redirect_url
                                ) pass_yn,
    bl.application_id, 
    bl.redirect_url,
    bl.page_id,
    bl.page_name,
    bl.button_name,  
    bl.label, 
    bl.region,
    app.created_by,
    app.created_on,
    coalesce(bl.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
    coalesce(bl.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
	  bl.button_id component_id,
	  null parent_component_id,
	  bl.workspace
    from apex_application_page_buttons bl
    inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = bl.page_id
                                          and app.application_id = bl.application_id
    inner join v_apex_applications aa1 on bl.application_id = aa1.application_id
                                       and aa1.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
	  left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = app.build_option
                                                         and aabo1.application_id = app.application_id
    left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = bl.build_option
                                                         and aabo2.application_id = bl.application_id
	  where bl.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
    and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
    and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
) a110
FIX: Fix the URL or eliminate the button

QUERY_CLOB:
select 'N' pass_yn,
       aap.application_id,
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (`%2`, app %1) is unreachable. please link to it / delete it / put under a `dev_only` build.',
                          p0 => aap.page_id,
                          p1 => aap.application_id,
                          p2 => aap.page_name) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) is unreachable',
                          p0 => aap.page_id,
                          p1 => aap.application_id) issue_title,
       aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.workspace,
       aap.page_name
from apex_application_pages aap
left outer join v_mv_svt spu on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                            and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and spu.destination_page_id is null
and aap.page_id not in (0,1,101,9999)
and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: Pages that are not linked to should be removed to declutter the application : This page is not linked to from anywhere. If this page is not in use, it should be removed to declutter the application
FIX: Delete the page or link to it.

QUERY_CLOB:
select 
a100.pass_yn,
a100.application_id,
a100.column_link_url,
a100.region_name,
a100.heading,
a100.page_id,
a100.page_name,
a100.column_alias,
a100.created_by,
a100.created_on,
a100.last_updated_by, 
a100.last_updated_on,
case when a100.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^invalid colum link: %0 
        region name : %1
        heading : %2 
        column_alias : %3^',
     p0 => a100.column_link_url,
     p1 => a100.region_name,
     p2 => a100.heading,
     p3 => a100.column_alias
     )
     end as validation_failure_message,
case when a100.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Invalid colum link (page %1, app %2)^',
     p0 => a100.column_link_url,
     p1 => a100.page_id,
     p2 => a100.application_id
     )
     end as issue_title,
a100.component_id,
a100.parent_component_id,
a100.workspace
from (
    select 
    eba_stds_parser.is_valid_url (p_origin_app_id => prc.application_id,
                                p_url           => prc.column_link_url
                                ) pass_yn,
    prc.application_id,
    prc.column_link_url,
    prc.region_name,
    prc.heading,
    prc.page_id,
    prc.page_name,
    prc.column_alias,
    app.created_by, 
    app.created_on, 
    coalesce(prc.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
    coalesce(prc.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
	  prc.region_report_column_id component_id,
	  null parent_component_id,
	  prc.workspace
    from  apex_application_page_rpt_cols prc 
    inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = prc.page_id
                                          and app.application_id = prc.application_id
    inner join v_apex_applications aa on  aa.application_id = prc.application_id
                                      and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
	  left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = app.build_option
                                                         and aabo1.application_id = app.application_id
    left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = prc.build_option
                                                         and aabo2.application_id = prc.application_id

    where prc.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
    and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
    and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
) a100
EXPLANATION: The URL in the column link is invalid
FIX: Fix the link or remove it.

QUERY_CLOB:
with 
    plug_link_count as (
        select pl.list_id, count(*) lcount
            from apex_application_page_regions pl
            group by pl.list_id
        ),
    nav_link_count as (
        select ui.navigation_list_id, count(*) lcount
            from apex_appl_user_interfaces ui
            group by ui.navigation_list_id
        ),
    nav_bar_link_count as (
        select ui.nav_bar_list_id, count(*) lcount
            from apex_appl_user_interfaces ui
            group by ui.nav_bar_list_id
        ),
    a120 as (
        select
        eba_stds_parser.is_valid_url (p_origin_app_id => ale.application_id,
                                    p_url           => ale.entry_target
                                    ) pass_yn,
        ale.application_id,
        ale.entry_target,
        ale.list_name,
        ale.list_id, 
        ale.list_entry_id component_id,
			  ale.list_entry_parent_id parent_component_id,
        ale.entry_text,
        coalesce(plc.lcount,0) + coalesce(nlc.lcount,0) + coalesce(nblc.lcount,0) ref_count,
        ale.condition_type_code,
        ale.build_option,
        bo.build_option_status,
			  bo.status_on_export,
        aa1.created_on,
        aa1.created_by,
        ale.last_updated_by, 
        ale.last_updated_on,
			  ale.workspace
        from apex_application_list_entries ale
        inner join v_apex_applications aa1 on ale.application_id = aa1.application_id
                                        and aa1.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
        left join apex_application_build_options bo on ale.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                    and ale.build_option = bo.build_option_name
        left join plug_link_count plc on plc.list_id = ale.list_id
        left join nav_link_count nlc on nlc.navigation_list_id = ale.list_id
        left join nav_bar_link_count nblc on nblc.nav_bar_list_id = ale.list_id
        where ale.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
			  and (ale.condition_type_code != 'NEVER' or ale.condition_type_code is null)
        and (bo.status_on_export != 'Exclude' or bo.status_on_export is null)
    )
select 
a120.pass_yn,
a120.application_id,
null page_id,
a120.entry_target,
a120.list_name,
a120.list_id, 
a120.component_id,
a120.entry_text,
a120.ref_count,
a120.condition_type_code,
a120.build_option,
a120.build_option_status,
a120.created_by,
a120.created_on,
a120.last_updated_by, 
a120.last_updated_on,
case when a120.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^List entry (%4,%3) in list (%1, %2) has an invalid link: %0 (build: %7)^',
     p0 => a120.entry_target,
     p1 => a120.list_name,
     p2 => a120.list_id, 
     p3 => a120.component_id,
     p4 => a120.entry_text,
     p5 => a120.ref_count,
     p6 => a120.condition_type_code,
     p7 => a120.build_option,
     p8 => a120.build_option_status
     )
     end as validation_failure_message,
case when a120.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Invalid link in list entry (%4) in list %1, app %0^',
     p0 => a120.application_id,
     p1 => a120.list_name,
     p2 => a120.list_id, 
     p3 => a120.component_id,
     p4 => a120.entry_text
     )
     end as issue_title,
a120.parent_component_id,
a120.workspace
from a120
EXPLANATION: The URL in the list link is invalid
FIX: Fix the URL or eliminate the list item

TEST_NAME: Columns should have a valid authorization scheme
QUERY_CLOB:
select 
a70.pass_yn,
a70.application_id,
a70.page_id,
a70.page_name,
a70.region_name,
a70.column_alias,
a70.heading,
a70.authorization_scheme,
a70.authorization_scheme_id,
a70.created_by, 
a70.created_on, 
a70.last_updated_by, 
a70.last_updated_on,
case when a70.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Columm, %1, in region, %0, has an invalid authorization scheme: %3^',
            p0 => a70.region_name,
            p1 => a70.column_alias,
            p2 => a70.heading,
            p3 => a70.authorization_scheme,
            p4 => a70.authorization_scheme_id
            )
            end as validation_failure_message,
case when a70.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Columm %1 has an invalid authorization scheme (app %2, page %3)^',
            p0 => a70.region_name,
            p1 => a70.column_alias,
            p2 => a70.application_id,
            p3 => a70.page_id
            )
            end as issue_title,
a70.component_id,
a70.parent_component_id,
a70.workspace
from (
     select
     case when prc.authorization_scheme = prc.authorization_scheme_id
          then 'N'
          else 'Y'
          end as pass_yn,
     prc.application_id,
     prc.page_id,
     prc.page_name,
     prc.region_name,
     prc.column_alias,
     prc.heading,
     prc.authorization_scheme,
     prc.authorization_scheme_id,
     app.created_by, 
     app.created_on, 
     coalesce(prc.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
     coalesce(prc.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
	   prc.region_report_column_id component_id,
	   null parent_component_id,
	   prc.workspace
     from apex_application_page_rpt_cols prc
     inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = prc.page_id
                                           and app.application_id = prc.application_id
     inner join  v_apex_applications aa on prc.application_id = aa.application_id
                                        and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
	   left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = app.build_option
                                                          and aabo1.application_id = app.application_id
     left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = prc.build_option
                                                          and aabo2.application_id = prc.application_id

     where prc.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
     and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
     and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
     and prc.authorization_scheme is not null
	
) a70
EXPLANATION: The authorization on your column is in an invalid state
FIX: Remove the authorization scheme or replace it.

TEST_NAME: Button display positions should not be legacy or deprecated
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when svt_apex_view.display_position_is_violation (
                p_display_position_code => aapb.display_position_code,
                p_template_id           => apr.template_id,
                p_application_id        => aapb.application_id) = 'Y'
						then 'N'
						else 'Y'
						end pass_yn, 
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (page %1, app %2) is in an invalid (legacy or deprecated) display position (`%3`)',
              p0 => aapb.button_name,
              p1 => aapb.page_id,
              p2 => aapb.application_id,
              p3 => aapb.display_position_code
            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` in legacy / deprecated position (page %1, app %2)',
              p0 => aapb.button_name,
              p1 => aapb.page_id,
              p2 => aapb.application_id
            ) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id, 
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.display_position,
       aapb.display_position_code,
       apr.template_id,
       aapb.button_name,
			 aapb.workspace
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on aapb.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and aapb.application_id = apr.application_id
                                             and aapb.page_id = apr.page_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: Buttons should not be placed in display positions are deprecated or legacy

TEST_NAME: Classic Column Link Authorization Matches Destination
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       spu.page_id, 
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme (%3) on column `%0` (report `%6`, page %1, app %2) does not match the destination (page %4, authorization `%5`)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null'),
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) validation_failure_message,
        apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on column `%0` (report `%6`, page %1, app %2) does not match the destination',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) issue_title,
       spu.page_authorization, 
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name, 
       spu.parent_element_name, 
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
			 spu.element_id component_id,
			 spu.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
 from mv_svt_classic_cols spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 where spu.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
EXPLANATION: The authorization scheme of a column link should match that of its destination
FIX: Add the requisite authorization scheme to the column

QUERY_CLOB:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       spu.page_id, 
			 null created_on,
			 null created_by,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme (%3) on button `%0` (page %1, app %2) does not match the destination (page %4, authorization `%5`)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null')
                          ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on button `%0` (page %1, app %2) does not match the destination',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id
                          ) issue_title,
       spu.page_authorization, 
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name, 
       spu.parent_element_name, 
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
			 spu.element_id component_id,
			 spu.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
 from mv_svt_buttons spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 where spu.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
 and url_type = 'BUTTON_URL'
 and spu.destination_app_id = spu.application_id
 and spu.destination_page_id != spu.page_id
EXPLANATION: The authorization scheme of a button should match that of its destination
FIX: Add the requisite authorization scheme to the button

TEST_NAME: IG Column Link Authorization Matches Destination
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       spu.page_id, 
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme (%3) on column `%0` (report `%6`, page %1, app %2) does not match the destination (page %4, authorization `%5`)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null'),
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) validation_failure_message,
        apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on column `%0` (report `%6`, page %1, app %2) does not match the destination',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) issue_title,
       spu.page_authorization, 
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name, 
       spu.parent_element_name, 
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
			 spu.element_id component_id,
			 spu.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
 from mv_svt_ig_cols spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 where spu.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
EXPLANATION: The authorization scheme of a column link should match that of its destination
FIX: Add the requisite authorization scheme to the column

TEST_NAME: IR Column Link Authorization Matches Destination
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       spu.page_id, 
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme (%3) on column `%0` (report `%6`, page %1, app %2) does not match the destination (page %4, authorization `%5`)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null'),
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) validation_failure_message,
        apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on column `%0` (report `%6`, page %1, app %2) does not match the destination',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) issue_title,
       spu.page_authorization, 
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name, 
       spu.parent_element_name, 
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
			 spu.element_id component_id,
			 spu.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
 from mv_svt_ir_cols spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                      and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id

 where spu.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
 and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: The authorization scheme of a column link should match that of its destination
FIX: Add the requisite authorization scheme to the column

QUERY_CLOB:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       null page_id, 
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme (%3) on breadcrumb entry `%0` (app %2) does not match the destination (page %4, authorization `%5`)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null')
                          ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on breadcrumb entry `%0` (app %2) does not match the destination',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p2 => spu.application_id
                          ) issue_title,
       spu.page_authorization, 
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name, 
       spu.parent_element_name, 
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
       spu.element_id component_id, 
       spu.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
 from mv_svt_bc_entries spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 where spu.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
EXPLANATION: The Breadcrumb Entry Authorization Scheme should Matches that of its destination : The authorization scheme of a breadcrumb entry should match that of its destination
FIX: Add the requisite authorization scheme to the breadcrumb entry

TEST_NAME: Navigation List Entry Authorization Matches Destination
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       null page_id, 
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme (%3) on the Navigation List Entry `%0` (app %2) does not match the destination (page %4, authorization `%5`)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null'),
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) validation_failure_message,
        apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on the Navigation List Entry `%0` (app %2) does not match the destination',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) issue_title,
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name, 
       spu.parent_element_name, 
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
			 spu.element_id component_id, 
			 spu.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
			 spu.workspace
 from mv_svt_list_entries spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id

 where spu.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
 and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
 and spu.url_type = 'LIST_ENTRY'
EXPLANATION: The authorization scheme of a Navigation List Entry should match that of its destination
FIX: Add the requisite authorization scheme to the Navigation List Entry

TEST_NAME: Public pages should not require authentication
QUERY_CLOB:
select a60.pass_yn, 
       a60.application_id,
       a60.page_id, 
       a60.page_name, 
       a60.page_access_protection, 
       a60.page_mode,
       a60.page_requires_authentication,
       a60.build_option,
       a60.build_option_status,
       a60.authorization_scheme,
       a60.last_updated_by, 
       a60.last_updated_on, 
       a60.created_by, 
       a60.created_on,
       case when a60.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Public pages should not have authorization scheme. This page has authorization scheme: %5^',
            p0 => a60.page_access_protection, 
            p1 => a60.page_mode,
            p2 => a60.page_requires_authentication,
            p3 => a60.build_option,
            p4 => a60.build_option_status,
            p5 => a60.authorization_scheme,
            p6 => a60.last_updated_by, 
            p7 => a60.last_updated_on, 
            p8 => a60.created_by, 
            p9 => a60.created_on
            )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a60.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Remove authorization scheme from public page %0 (app %1)^',
            p0 => a60.page_id, 
            p1 => a60.application_id
            )
            end as issue_title,
			 a60.page_id component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 a60.workspace
from (
     select 
     case when aap.page_requires_authentication = 'No'
          then case when aap.authorization_scheme is null
                    then 'Y'
                    else case when aap.authorization_scheme = 'APPLICATION SENTRY'
                              then 'Y'
                              else 'N'
                              end
                    end
          else 'Y'
          end as pass_yn, 
     aap.application_id,
     aap.page_id, 
     aap.page_name, 
     aap.page_access_protection, 
     aap.page_mode,
     aap.page_requires_authentication,
     aap.build_option,
     bo.build_option_status,
	   bo.status_on_export,
     aap.authorization_scheme,
     aap.created_by created_by, 
     aap.created_on created_on,
     aap.last_updated_by, 
     aap.last_updated_on,
	   aap.workspace
     from apex_application_pages aap
     inner join v_apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                     and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
     left join apex_application_build_options bo on aap.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                 and aap.build_option = bo.build_option_name
     where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
	   and (bo.status_on_export != 'Exclude' or bo.build_option_status is null)
) a60
EXPLANATION: Public pages should be public but they can be victims of an over-zealous attempt to give all pages an authorization scheme

TEST_NAME: Pages should not have unresolved critical issues
QUERY_CLOB:
with maxpvi as (select application_id, 
                       page_id, 
                       max(page_view_id) max_page_view_id
                  from apex_debug_messages
                  group by application_id, page_id),
     msglvl1 as (select adm.application_id, 
                        adm.page_id, 
                        adm.page_view_id, 
                        adm.message_level,
                        max(message) max_message
                from maxpvi
                inner join apex_debug_messages adm on maxpvi.max_page_view_id = adm.page_view_id
                                                   and adm.message_level in (1)
                group by adm.application_id, adm.page_id, adm.page_view_id, adm.message_level)
select 'N' pass_yn,
       aap.workspace,
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a critical (message level %5) error: `%3`, page_view_id : `%4`', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id,
        p3 => substr(msglvl1.max_message,1,100),
        p4 => msglvl1.page_view_id,
        p5 => msglvl1.message_level) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a critical error', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode,
       msglvl1.max_message,
       msglvl1.page_view_id,
       msglvl1.message_level
from msglvl1 
inner join apex_application_pages aap on msglvl1.application_id = aap.application_id
                                      and msglvl1.page_id = aap.page_id
																			and aap.page_id not in (101)
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: Looking for pages associated with message\_level 1 issues logged in apex\_debug\_messages
FIX: Once the page critical error is resolved, run the page in debug mode to resolve the error

TEST_NAME: Regular Pages should be Current in Navigation
QUERY_CLOB:
select 'N'  pass_yn,
       aap.application_id,
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) should be listed as current for an entry in the navigation menu (%2)',
                          p0 => aap.page_id,
                          p1 => aap.application_id,
                          p2 => aa.navigation_list
                        ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) is not listed as current for any entry in the navigation menu',
                          p0 => aap.page_id,
                          p1 => aap.application_id
                        ) issue_title,
       aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
       aa.navigation_list,
       aap.page_template,
			 aap.page_id component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
from apex_application_pages aap
inner join apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                and aa.navigation_list is not null
left outer join (select ale.application_id, cfpg.column_value page_id
                    from apex_application_list_entries ale
                    join table(apex_string.split(ale.current_for_pages_expression, ',')) cfpg on ale.current_for_pages_type_code = 'COLON_DELIMITED_PAGE_LIST'
                    join apex_applications aa on  ale.application_id = aa.application_id
                                              and ale.list_name = aa.navigation_list
                    where cfpg.column_value is not null
                    and validate_conversion(cfpg.column_value as number) = 1
                ) cdpl on  cdpl.application_id =  aap.application_id
                       and cdpl.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join (select ale.application_id, eba_stds_parser.page_from_url (p_origin_app_id => ale.application_id, p_url => ale.entry_target) page_id
                    from apex_application_list_entries ale
                    join apex_applications aa on  ale.application_id = aa.application_id
                                              and ale.list_name = aa.navigation_list
                    where ale.current_for_pages_type_code = 'TARGET_PAGE'
                ) tp on  tp.application_id = aap.application_id
                     and tp.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join (select application_id, page_id, count(*) proc_count
                    from apex_application_page_proc
                    where process_type = 'Form - Initialization'
                    group by application_id, page_id
                ) pp on  pp.application_id = aap.application_id
                     and pp.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE') 
and aap.page_mode = 'Normal'
and aap.page_id not in (0,101,9999)
and cdpl.application_id is null 
and tp.application_id is null
and pp.proc_count is null
and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aap.page_template not like 'AO%'
EXPLANATION: All non-form, normal Pages should be Current in the Navigation Menu : Normal non-form pages should be listed as current for a navigation menu list entry
FIX: Make the page `current` for a navigation menu list entry

QUERY_CLOB:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       spu.page_id, 
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme (%3) on the page branch (page %1, app %2) does not match the destination (page %4, authorization `%5`)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null')
                          ) validation_failure_message,
        apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on the page branch (page %1, app %2) does not match the destination',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id
                          ) issue_title,
       spu.page_authorization, 
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name,
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
			 aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
			 spu.page_id component_id,
	     null parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
 from mv_svt_page_branch spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                    and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
 where spu.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
 and spu.destination_page_id != spu.page_id
 and coalesce(spu.page_mode,'NA') not in ('Modal Dialog')
 and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: The authorization scheme of a page branch should match that of its destination
FIX: Add the requisite authorization scheme to the page branch
